headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BEBELL, NORMAN LARS

snippet: BEBELL--Norman Lars, WWII Marine officer and pioneer in the nitrogen burst system in photography, television color dailies and motion picture film post production, died on March 21, 2016. Predeceased by his wife Rochelle and survived in loving memory by his children Harlan and Kara. Memorial will be at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave., New York, NY 10028 on April 2, at 11:30am. (212)288-3500. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BEBELL--Norman Lars, WWII Marine officer and pioneer in the nitrogen burst system in photography, television color dailies and motion picture film post production, died on March 21, 2016.
